idea-plugin.name: better-mybatis-generator
idea-plugin.description:
function：use in datagrip，generate mybatis files (include:dao、example、domain、xml) for one or more tables;
step1: connect database. step2：select one or more tables,right click and select mybatis generate. step3：provide account password for the first time. step4：click ok，check your files.
setting: "Tools -> MyBatis Log Plugin" set custom default configuration，If not, use the program default configuration.
more tutorial please visit here： https://github.com/kmaster/better-mybatis-generator/blob/master/README.md
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.1 change Message to English.
1.0 the first time commit. provide mybatis Generate function according to configuration. provide default configuration in setting.
